metadata.original_prompt: Create a comprehensive analysis document reviewing how tapps-agents and Simple Mode were used in a database schema fix session. Include: 1) What commands were actually used, 2) What worked well, 3) What didn't work or could be improved, 4) Gaps between intended usage (@simple-mode) vs actual usage (CLI), 5) Constructive feedback for improvement, 6) Specific recommendations to make tapps-agents better. Be thorough, critical, and mentor-like with strong quality feedback.
